Seo.title: Attoly
Seo.description: Attoly lets you create short links as aliases for long URLs, making it easier to embed them in websites, chats, and documents. Say goodbye to overly long and error-prone URLs and get your personal Attoly Shortcut now.

hero.title: Shorten links. Share smarter.
hero.subtitle: Create beautiful, reliable short URLs with analytics and custom aliases.
hero.note: No sign-up required. Free to start.

NotFoundPage.headline: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.
